Contributor: Heyer, H. (Hermann), artist.; Victory Liberty Loan Committee.;
Note: Signed "Heyer." Date based on date of the Victory Liberty Loan Campaign. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text tells how the women have always helped by buying and selling bonds. Now for the Victory Liberty Loan they will work and save once more. Illustration shows different women representing various forms of service, including Red Cross nurses and servicewomen. This is a design for a newspaper and magazine advertisement.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Local Rights Statement: This material is made available for private study, scholarship, and research use. For access to the original or a high resolution reproduction, contact: Temple University Libraries, Special Collections Research Center, scrc@temple.edu, 215-204-8257.

Title: The women have always helped
